meta.title: Jaydai - Your Smart AI Assistant for ChatGPT
meta.description: Maximize your generative AI experience with Jaydai, the Chrome extension that transforms how you use ChatGPT with expert prompts, custom templates, and detailed analytics.

hero.badge: Maximize your AI potential with Jaydai
hero.title: Your Smart AI Assistant for ChatGPT
hero.subtitle: Transform how you use ChatGPT with our library of expert prompts, custom templates, and detailed analytics.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to maximize your AI potential
features.cta: Experience all these features and more with our free Chrome extension.

promptLibrary.title: Expert Prompt Library
promptLibrary.description: Access a curated collection of expert-crafted prompts for various use cases. Save time and get better results with proven prompt structures.

companyTemplates.title: Company Templates
companyTemplates.description: Share a customized prompt bank with your entire team for specific business use cases. Standardize AI interactions across your organization and ensure consistent results.

customTemplates.title: Create Custom Templates
customTemplates.description: Build and save your own prompt templates to save time when working on recurring projects. Organize them by category and access them with a single click.

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Track your AI usage with comprehensive analytics. Monitor time saved, energy footprint, and effectiveness of different prompt types to optimize your workflow.

updates.title: AI Advancement Updates
updates.description: Stay informed about the latest AI developments and how to leverage them. We continuously update our prompt libraries to incorporate new capabilities and techniques.

learning.title: Learning School
learning.description: Access our online learning platform with real-world simulations to master AI prompt engineering. Learn how to craft effective prompts for any situation.

features: Works with ChatGPT Free and Plus

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Jaydai
faq.cta: Still have questions? We're here to help.

items.question: What is Jaydai?
items.answer: Jaydai is a Chrome extension that enhances your ChatGPT experience with expert prompts, custom templates, and detailed analytics. It helps you get better results from AI while saving time.

items.question: How does Jaydai improve my ChatGPT experience?
items.answer: Jaydai provides a library of expert-crafted prompts, allows you to create and save your own templates, and offers detailed analytics on your AI usage. This helps you get more consistent, high-quality responses while saving time on prompt writing.

items.question: Is Jaydai compatible with ChatGPT Plus?
items.answer: Yes, Jaydai works seamlessly with both free and Plus versions of ChatGPT. It enhances the experience regardless of your subscription level.

items.question: Can I share my templates with my team?
items.answer: Yes, with our Team plan, you can create a shared template library for your entire organization, ensuring consistent AI interactions across your team.

items.question: How secure is my data with Jaydai?
items.answer: We take security seriously. Jaydai doesn't store your ChatGPT conversations on our servers. Your templates are securely stored and encrypted, and you have full control over your data.

items.question: Do you offer a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan with limited features so you can experience the benefits of Jaydai before upgrading to our Pro or Team plans.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help you get started with Jaydai.

success.title: Thank You!
